name: Tick Tock Time Machine
description:
Tick Tock Time Machine is a 2D platforming adventure for everyone!
Play as Charlie Parker, a feline adventurer whose only limit is his weight.
Use a mysterious pocket watch to bend time to your will & apply its powers to reach your goals.

Actual modifications that I've made to the game:

  • I created 4 new levels, one of them being a tutorial, with the other three being complete, coherent levels. Each one brings unique gameplay and challenges to the player.
  • I modified the main menu by changing its font, background, design, etc.
  • I reskinned the entire game. All the art, sprites, animations, etc. on the screen were created by me.
  • I utilized the Unity 2D experimental lighting feature to create a new, dynamic lighting system.
  • I added lava & water to add detail and flair to the game.
  • I replaced all the sound effects with my own custom effects, alongside creating custom music for the main menu and levels.
  • I added a new player ability, which allows the player to slow and speed up time. Each of these different states of time allows for special abilities and variations in gameplay.
  • I modified the in-game GUI to display the current pace of time and modified health bar.

Credits:

Created by Chris Cardimen in September of 2021 for MI445-001 at MSU.
All art, sounds, and other graphical assets are my own. The custom scripts that were written are also my own. The only asset that isn't my own, is the font: Retron2000,
Base gameplay functionality was provided by Michigan State University.
